column5: The Criminology - MSc course at the University of Leicester provides students with an in-depth theoretical and applied understanding of crime, deviance, offenders, and victims. The course enables students to focus on their particular area of interest while gaining knowledge and skills sought by agencies associated with the criminal justice process. The selection of option modules allows students to specialize in areas such as Forensic and Legal Psychology, Responding to Terrorism, Hate Crime and the Psychology of Evil. This degree will develop your capacity for imaginative, rigorous and critical thinking along with specific knowledge of social processes related to crime.
